Literature.Title: Altering the composition of caseicins A and B as a means of determining the contribution of specific residues to antimicrobial activity.
Literature.Author: Norberg S, O'Connor PM, Stanton C, Ross RP, Hill C, Fitzgerald GF, Cotter PD

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Cronobacter sakazakii DPC 6440(MIC=1250µM),Cronobacter sakazakii DSM 4485(MIC=2500µM),Cronobacter sakazakii ATCC BAA-894(MIC=2500µM),Cronobacter muytjensii ATCC 51329(MIC=2500µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium LT2(MIC=1250µM),Escherichia coli NCIMB 11843(MIC=1250µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae NCIMB 13218(MIC=1250µM),Pseudomonas fluorescens NCIMB 9046(MIC=1250µM),Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 8325-4(MIC=1250µM),Staphylococcus aureus SA113(MIC=625µM),Staphylococcus aureus RF122(MIC=1250µM),Staphylococcus aureus Newman(MIC=1250µM),Staphylococcus aureus RN4220(MIC=1250µM)
